application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Weeping Birch (applicants ref. T1) - Approx 6m. Reduce lateral and sub lateral growth to clear street land by approx 1.25m. 1 x Pine (applicants ref. T2) - Approx 5m. Remove dead wood throughout.1 x Pine (applicants ref. T4) - Approx 7m. Remove dead wood.1 x Pine (applicants ref. T5) - Approx 6m. Remove dead wood throughout. Raise low crown by approx 1m. Cherry Group (applicants ref. G1) - Approx 5.5m-6m. Remove epicormic growth on main stems.1 x Leaning Plum (applicants ref. T6) - Approx 4.5m. Raise crown by approx 1m. Remove epicormic growth throughout.1 x Leaning Plum (applicants ref. T7) - Approx 4.5m. Remove epicormic growth throughout.1 x Conifer (applicants ref. T8) - Approx 6m. Fell to ground level.1 x Conifer (applicants ref. T9) - Approx 7m. Remove dead stems.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T10) - Approx 9m. Reduce the main prone, ivy clad dead stem to a point just below the failed section by approx 5m.2 x Purple Plums (applicants ref. T11, T12) - Approx 6m. Remove epicormic growth throughout crowns. Remove dead wood. Trim back to clear building by 1.2m.Oak and Ash Group (applicants ref. T13, T14) - Approx 9m. Prune back lateral side branches to a height of approx 7m providing a clearance of the building of 1.2m.1 x Apple (applicants ref. T15) - Approx 5m. Trim to tidy and reduce by 1.25m, reducing weight burden and windsail area. Thin by 20%.1 x Elder (applicants ref. T16) - Approx 4m. Prune back from the lawn to tidy and control encroachment.1 x Plane (applicants ref. T17) - Approx 9m. Reduce crown by up to Approx 2.5m-3m.3 x Birch (applicants ref. T18, T19, T20) - Approx 5m. Remove dead wood only.Cherry Group (applicants ref. G3) - Approx 5m. Remove epicormic growth from main stems. Tip prune lateral and sub lateral growth, growing across pavement and into road by approx 1.5m-2m to provide sufficient clearance.
